com.networknt.portal.usermanagement.auth.service

Interface SessionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionServiceImpl

    public interface SessionService
    SessionService takes care of issuing new sessions and checking existing ones.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session createSession(long sessionId, long userId, String token)
      Creates a Session for the given User.
      Session createSession(long sessionId, long userId, String token, int minutes)
      Creates a Session for the given User, which is valid for minutes.
      Optional<Session> findSession(Long id)
      Gets the Session for the given ID.
      Session getSession(Long id)
      Gets the Session for the given ID.
      void logoutUser(Long userId)
      Logs the user out by invalidating all of its Sessions.
      void useSession(Long id, String value, LocalDateTime lastUsedAt)
      Updates the Session for the given ID.

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

        Session createSession(long sessionId,
                      long userId,
                      String token)
        Creates a Session for the given User.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - a Session's ID
        userId - a User's ID
        Returns:
        a newly created session

      • createSession

        Session createSession(long sessionId,
                      long userId,
                      String token,
                      int minutes)
        Creates a Session for the given User, which is valid for minutes.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - a Session's ID
        userId - a User's ID
        minutes - minutes to expire from now
        Returns:
        a newly created session

      • findSession

        Optional<Session> findSession(Long id)
        Gets the Session for the given ID.
        Returns:
        a Session if it exists.

      • getSession

        Session getSession(Long id)
            throws NoSuchSessionException
        Gets the Session for the given ID.
        Returns:
        a Session if it exists.
        Throws:
        NoSuchSessionException - when there is no such session for the given ID

      • logoutUser

        void logoutUser(Long userId)
        Logs the user out by invalidating all of its Sessions.
        Parameters:
        userId - User ID

      • useSession

        void useSession(Long id,
                String value,
                LocalDateTime lastUsedAt)
         throws NoSuchSessionException
        Updates the Session for the given ID.
        Throws:
        NoSuchSessionException - when there is no such session for the given ID
